import React, {useState} from "react"; import Tab from "react-bootstrap/Tab"; import Tabs from "react-bootstrap/Tabs"; function TabNav(event) { // function convertToJPG() { // var pngFile = document.getElementById('png-file').files[0]; // var pngImage = new Image(); // var canvas = document.createElement('canvas'); // var ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); // var imgData; // pngImage.onload = function() { // canvas.width = pngImage.width; // canvas.height = pngImage.height; // ctx.drawImage(pngImage, 0, 0); // imgData = canvas.toDataURL('image/jpeg'); // document.getElementById('jpg-image').src = imgData; // }; // pngImage.src = URL.createObjectURL(pngFile); // } const [pngFile, setPngFile] = useState(null); const [jpgImage, setJpgImage] = useState(null); function handleFileChange(event) { setPngFile(event.target.files[0]); } function convertToJPG() { const pngImage = new Image(); const canvas = document.createElement('canvas'); const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d'); let imgData; pngImage.onload = function() { canvas.width = pngImage.width; canvas.height = pngImage.height; ctx.drawImage(pngImage, 0, 0); imgData = canvas.toDataURL('image/jpeg'); setJpgImage(imgData); }; pngImage.src = URL.createObjectURL(pngFile); } return ( <>
